description: Police spoke to a man about "security concerns" over a social media post written three weeks earlier.
title: Man pulled aside at Guernsey Airport security over tweet
title_page: Man pulled aside at Guernsey Airport security over tweet - BBC News
maintext: The post said someone he knew had been told by a member of the airport's security team that they "seemed to have bomb making equipment" in their bag, which turned out to be charging cables.
